original_title: បញ្ចពណ៌ទេវី
overview: Tévy dresses as a boy in order to participate in a class given at Padamok school. Tévy falls in love with Panchapoi, one of her close classmates. But when Tévy’s true identity is revealed, the son of a Cham millionaire falls madly in love with her and asks her parents’ permission to marry her…

production_companies.name: កងពេជ្រភាព

title: Pacha Por Tévy
